name: Bob's Body House
description:
Bob's Body House was made during Beginners Circle Jam #4

Bob's Body House is airing again! The infamous weekly gameshow where the participant escapes a haunted location in order to save his own life and win $5,000!

The audience can vote to either help him or make his task harder. Furthermore, the audience can be appeased by a good performance so that they root for the participant and vote in his favor.

Do you have what it takes to survive? 

Controls:
AD/Arrow keys - Move
W/UP - Jump
Spacebar - Interact
